events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
After reviewing your resume, your experience with devops and backend development looks promising for the engineering role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10 AM UTC to assess your software engineering skills and problem-solving abilities.
The technical interview concluded successfully, and the engineering panel was impressed with your coding proficiency and system design knowledge.
We are pleased to extend you a formal offer for the Software Engineer role, reflecting your skills and our team's goals.
Thank you for accepting the offer; we look forward to welcoming you to our engineering team and supporting your career growth.
Your onboarding process has started, including setting up your development environment and introducing you to our engineering projects.
The hiring process is now officially closed, and we are thrilled to have you as a valuable member of our software development team.
